page.title: 07DANIEL'S DAY
page.content: 7.15 a.m. Woke, had Weetabix for breakfast, got ready for the 5 km. journey to school by bus. 9.00 a.m. Went to assembly, then did maths until break-time. 10.40 a.m. Played 'ball-it' at playtime. 11.00 a.m. Did English and Geography until dinner. 12.00 p.m. Dinner, had mashed potatoes sausages and baked beans and lemon meringue pie for afters, then went out to play. 1.20 p.m. Had games, played non-stop cricket and practiced for Sports Day. 2.30 p.m. Break-time, played 'shadow it'. 2.45 p.m. Finished playing non-stop cricket. 3.30 p.m. Caught bus for home. 4.00 p.m. Got changed and went out to play on my bike.
